mapper.select: SELECT A.cell_no, A.gen_voltage, A.gen_elec_current, A.created_at FROM cell_generated_elec AS A JOIN (SELECT cell_no, plant_no FROM generate_cell WHERE plant_no = #{plantNo} ) AS B ON A.cell_no = B.cell_no WHERE DATE(A.created_at) = CURDATE()

SELECT A.cell_no, A.gen_voltage, A.gen_elec_current FROM cell_generated_elec A JOIN ( SELECT cell_no, MAX(created_at) AS max_created_at FROM cell_generated_elec GROUP BY cell_no ) AS B ON A.cell_no = B.cell_no AND A.created_at = B.max_created_at JOIN generate_cell AS GC ON A.cell_no = GC.cell_no WHERE GC.plant_no = #{plantNo} AND DATE(A.created_at) = CURDATE()
